title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Atlanta, GA, USA
description:
Join us for the Global Day of Code Retreat on December 14. Led by Stafford Brooke (http://www.bignerdranch.com/about_us/nerds/stafford_brooke), the Atlanta code retreat is a gathering of developers improving their craft. 
The event will be free*. RSVPÂ here (https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-code-retreat-2013-atlanta-ga-tickets-9362652947). 
* Sign-up fee will be refunded once your attendance is confirmed.

The event time zone is GMT instead of ET
